pageProps.title: Berkeley Neural Parser
pageProps.teaser: Constituency Parsing with a Self-Attentive Encoder (ACL 2018)

data.title: Berkeley Neural Parser
data.slogan: Constituency Parsing with a Self-Attentive Encoder (ACL 2018)
data.description: A Python implementation of the parsers described in *"Constituency Parsing with a Self-Attentive Encoder"* from ACL 2018.
code_example: doc = nlp('The time for action is now. It is never too late to do something.')
# (S (NP (NP (DT The) (NN time)) (PP (IN for) (NP (NN action)))) (VP (VBZ is) (ADVP (RB now))) (. .))
data.author: Nikita Kitaev
